messages.title: BREXIT: SHEFFIELD NEEDS A STRONG GREEN VOICE

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Security and certainty for EU citizens
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Security and certainty for EU citizens in our city - they are part of our community
Strong standards for the food we eat and the products we buy
Workers' rights to be maintained and enhanced
Protections for our natural world and the places we live
Free movement of people between the UK and EU to live, work, and study

issues.brexitEurope: BREXIT: SHEFFIELD NEEDS A STRONG GREEN VOICE

politicalExperience.achievements: Elected Greens are working to defend your rights in Brussels and at Westminster

endorsements.endorsement: Elected Green MEP Molly Scott Cato and Green MP Caroline Lucas

images.caption: Sheffield Central candidate Natalie Bennett (centre) with Green MEP Molly Scott Cato and Green MP Caroline Lucas.
